languages.text: {n}Громовой голос Эрбрегхта ап Даэффа оглушает прямотой под стать гласу его господина. За ним нет ни фальши, ни яда, ни злоухищрения — лишь искреннее желание действовать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Громовой голос Эрбрегхта ап Даэффа оглушает прямотой под стать гласу его господина. За ним нет ни фальши, ни яда, ни злоухищрения — лишь искреннее желание действовать.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Erbreght ap Daeff's booming voice is deafeningly straightforward, just like the voice of his master. There is no falsehood, no venom, no malice, only sincerity and a burning desire to act.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Громовой голос Эрбрегхта ап Даэффа оглушает прямотой под стать гласу его господина. За ним нет ни фальши, ни яда, ни злоухищрения — лишь искреннее желание действовать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Erbreght ap Daeff's booming voice is deafeningly straightforward, just like the voice of his master. There is no falsehood, no venom, no malice, only sincerity and a burning desire to act.{/n}
{n}Erbreght ap Daeff's booming voice is deafeningly straightforward, just like the voice of his master. There is no falsehood, no venom, no malice, only sincerity and a burning desire to act.{/n}
{n}Erbreght ap Daeff's booming voice is deafeningly straightforward, just like the voice of his master. There is no falsehood, no venom, no malice, only sincerity and a burning desire to act.{/n}
{n}Erbreght ap Daeff's booming voice is deafeningly straightforward, just like the voice of his master. There is no falsehood, no venom, no malice, only sincerity and a burning desire to act.{/n}
{n}Erbreght ap Daeff's booming voice is deafeningly straightforward, just like the voice of his master. There is no falsehood, no venom, no malice, only sincerity and a burning desire to act.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Comme celle de son maître, la voix puissante d'Erbreght ap Daeff est implacable, presque assourdissante. Elle ne trahit aucun mensonge, aucun poison ni aucune malveillance, mais exprime au contraire la sincérité et un désir ardent d'agir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Erbreght ap Daeff's booming voice is deafeningly straightforward, just like the voice of his master. There is no falsehood, no venom, no malice, only sincerity and a burning desire to act.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Comme celle de son maître, la voix puissante d'Erbreght ap Daeff est implacable, presque assourdissante. Elle ne trahit aucun mensonge, aucun poison ni aucune malveillance, mais exprime au contraire la sincérité et un désir ardent d'agir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}埃尔布雷特·爱普·戴夫的声音洪亮直白，震耳欲聋，就像他的主人的声音一样。他的声音中没有虚伪，没有奸诈，也没有恶意，只有真诚与渴望行动的决心。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Erbreght ap Daeff's booming voice is deafeningly straightforward, just like the voice of his master. There is no falsehood, no venom, no malice, only sincerity and a burning desire to act.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}埃尔布雷特·爱普·戴夫的声音洪亮直白，震耳欲聋，就像他的主人的声音一样。他的声音中没有虚伪，没有奸诈，也没有恶意，只有真诚与渴望行动的决心。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Erbreght ap Daeffs dröhnende Stimme ist ohrenbetäubend direkt, genau wie die Stimme seines Meisters. Es liegen keine Täuschung darin, kein Gift, keine Tücke, nur Aufrichtigkeit und der brennende Wunsch, zu handeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Erbreght ap Daeff's booming voice is deafeningly straightforward, just like the voice of his master. There is no falsehood, no venom, no malice, only sincerity and a burning desire to act.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Erbreght ap Daeffs dröhnende Stimme ist ohrenbetäubend direkt, genau wie die Stimme seines Meisters. Es liegen keine Täuschung darin, kein Gift, keine Tücke, nur Aufrichtigkeit und der brennende Wunsch, zu handeln.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La retumbante voz de Erbreght ap Daeff es sorprendentemente directa, al igual que la de su señor. Sin falsedad, sin crueldad, sin malicia, solo sinceridad y un deseo ferviente de pasar a la acción.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Erbreght ap Daeff's booming voice is deafeningly straightforward, just like the voice of his master. There is no falsehood, no venom, no malice, only sincerity and a burning desire to act.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La retumbante voz de Erbreght ap Daeff es sorprendentemente directa, al igual que la de su señor. Sin falsedad, sin crueldad, sin malicia, solo sinceridad y un deseo ferviente de pasar a la acción.{/n}

languages.text: {n}エルブレート・アプ・ダエフの轟く声は、その主人の声と同様に率直だった。偽りや毒や悪意はなく、誠実さと燃えるような行動への熱意だけが伝わった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Erbreght ap Daeff's booming voice is deafeningly straightforward, just like the voice of his master. There is no falsehood, no venom, no malice, only sincerity and a burning desire to act.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エルブレート・アプ・ダエフの轟く声は、その主人の声と同様に率直だった。偽りや毒や悪意はなく、誠実さと燃えるような行動への熱意だけが伝わった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Erbreght ap Daeff'in gürleyen sesi, efendisini aratmayan dobra sözleriyle âdeta kulak tırmalıyor. İşin içinde yalan, dolan yahut pislik yok. Sadece eyleme geçme arzusu ve samimiyet var.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Erbreght ap Daeff's booming voice is deafeningly straightforward, just like the voice of his master. There is no falsehood, no venom, no malice, only sincerity and a burning desire to act.{/n}
